context.commit_message:
Organize super-agents archiving into single directory structure

- Changed backup location from scattered root directories to organized archived_files/
- Initialization backups: archived_files/super_agents_backup_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS/
- Upgrade backups: archived_files/super_agents_upgrade_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS/
- Enhanced backup manifests with detailed metadata and reasoning
- Updated .gitignore to exclude archive directories but include template documentation
- Added README.md in archive template explaining structure and cleanup procedures
